isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 5000 9100 9200 9400 9900 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 5000, 5000i, 9000, 9000i - INSTRUMENT CLUSTER

svcsubproc.title: Removing Instrument Cluster
svcsubproc.para: Remove the screw in each of the cluster corners and remove the cluster. The right gauge cluster contains the two mechanical air gauges. They have air line connections that must be removed for complete removal of the cluster.

step1.para: Remove air from the vehicle primary and secondary systems.
The air gauges have connector-less push on fittings. To remove the line, depress the blue collar and pull the line out. To install, just push the line into the blue collar.

svcsubproc.title: Installing Instrument Cluster
svcsubproc.para: To install, reverse the process listed above.
